My Way Of Working

All of my Project That I work on is The design by me in such a way that the result is always what the Customer required.

1

Discuss The Project

Phase-1 For any of my work is to start the discussion of the topic and making the most out of the Conversation knowing the details of the topic is the best way to making the thing what the customer wants and having close work toward the project.

2

BrainStroming

Phase-2 Ideas are only executed When you work on it By through the time making the design wireframe, thinking which framework to use and having the best customer satisfaction are some of the Priority of The developer as well as Designer

3

UI/UX Planning

Phase-3 I start the planning of making the UI/UX design more comprehensive and making it look like something that closes me to the goal of my project making it in such a way that writing the CSS and HTML is not difficult and it must look good.

4

Reviews

Phase-4 Always think about what the customer wants and knowing that Have I hit the expectation of them is more important and It feels Good to Know your Pros and Your Cons.
